com.example.spoon.ordering.wizard.model

Class AbstractWizardModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.spoon.ordering.wizard.model.AbstractWizardModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModelCallbacks
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SandwichWizardModel

    public abstract class AbstractWizardModel
extends Object
implements ModelCallbacks
    Represents a wizard model, including the pages/steps in the wizard, their dependencies, and their currently populated choices/values/selections. To create an actual wizard model, extend this class and implement onNewRootPageList().
